Package io.micronaut.core.convert.value

package io.micronaut.core.convert.value
Micronaut core type conversion of multiple values.
Since:
1.0
Author:
graemerocher

    ConvertibleMultiValues<V>
    Specialization of ConvertibleValues where each name has multiple possible values.
